segments.text: I am sorry , sir . I have broken the reading lamp in my room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , sir . May I have your room number ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 503 . I would like to pay for it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please fill out the form first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , can you bring me a new one ?
segments.speaker: S1
